title: layout error in package fmt for scan formats
body:
by **ehog.hedge**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Read the documentation for package fmt; search for the sentence
   fragment "point or complex value" in the Scanning: section.

What is the expected output?
   Something properly laid out. 

What do you see instead?
    The fragment "point or complex value" is indented with a grey
    background -- it is part of a pre block -- and separated from
    the sentence introduction. Additionally that sentence introduction
    has been concatenated with the two previous sentences.

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?

godoc!

Which operating system are you using?

linux

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)

5101194d056f+ tip

Please provide any additional information below.

It looks like that who region should have been a highlighted pre
block, but that there are tabs missing. Or it should have been several
sentences of plain text, but that newlines are missing and there's
a superfluous tab on the "point or complex" line.
